author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology to pay 2017 dividend on May 4
text:
April 25(Reuters) - Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 5.4 yuan per 10 shares(before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on May 3
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 4 and the dividend will be paid on May 4
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/NQ3Ksy
